welcome.p: Join us every Sunday morning and Wednesday evening for our live webcast. You may watch, using the Windows Media Player Series 9Â®, during the times listed below. When you're ready to go, click on the Live button below to join us at our home in Austin, Texas.
welcome.subtext: You need a recent version of the Windows Media Player. You can watch over a 28K modem, 56K modem, or cable modem or DSL connection.

broadcasts.sidetext: Note that this link is only active during the live webcast. During non-service times the Windows Media Player will report an error.

video-archives.p: If you've missed the live webcast you can view recent services here. We archive the 2 most recent Sunday and Wednesday Windows Media videos; click on one of the links below to watch.

audio-archives.p: A large number of the messages are available. Visit the Audio Archives for a list of available messages.
